org.mitre.synthea.identity

Class EntityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.synthea.identity.EntityManager

  • public class EntityManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class that manages all Entities in a simulation. This class will typically be instantiated using the fromJSON static method.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EntityManager()

      • findEntity

        public Entity findEntity(java.lang.String entityId)
        Find a particular Entity by Id.
        Parameters:
        entityId - The Id to look for
        Returns:
        The found Entity, or null if one does not exist with the given Id.

      • getPopulationSize

        public int getPopulationSize()

      • validate

        public boolean validate()
        Ensures that all Entities loaded by this EntityManager are valid.
        Returns:
        true if all Entities are valid

      • fromJSON

        public static EntityManager fromJSON(java.lang.String rawJSON)
        Creates a new EntityManager by reading in the JSON containing all of the information on entities, seeds and variants.
        Parameters:
        rawJSON - the actual JSON
        Returns:
        an Entity Manager
